pkgmetadata.longdescription: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Welcome to sttable's documentation!~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Parser of string representation tables, input example:: header_1st_col | header_2nd_col |\n row_1_of_1st_col | row_1_of_2nd_col |\n row_2_of_1st_col | row_2_of_2nd_col |Parsed information can be accessed by rows:: [{'header_1st_col': 'row_1_of_1st_col', 'header_2nd_col': 'row_1_of_2nd_col'}, {'header_1st_col': 'row_2_of_1st_col', 'header_2nd_col': 'row_2_of_2nd_col'}]As well as by columns:: {'header_1st_col': ['row_1_of_1st_col', 'row_2_of_1st_col'], header_2nd_col': ['row_1_of_2nd_col', 'row_2_of_2nd_col']}Fields:: ['header_1st_col', 'header_2nd_col', 'header_3rd_col']
